page.title: 02Musbury Castle
page.content:
{Musbury Castle}is not a castle that has high walls.All it is is some earthworks.Musbury Castle means Great Castle.
There are three other castle around it _ they are Blackbury, Membury and Axmouth.
In 100 B.C people from Brittany invaded and in 400 A.D the Saxons did.
You can still see some of the stones they used to build the fort. You can see for miles on end.
They used to send smoke signals to other forts to warn about enemies. That was not the only time they used the fort. In World War 2,Cecil Day-Lewis was an air warden up there.
